name: exultantly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a very happy way, especially about someone else's defeat or failure: The fans headed exultantly home. She was exultantly singing the team anthem. See
exultant
More examplesFewer examplesConservatives were exultantly claiming their strategy had worked.The woman cried out exultantly.She high-fived exultantly on every possible occasion.
